metadata.title: CVE-2020-27304 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The CivetWeb web library does not validate uploaded filepaths when runningon an OS other than Windows, when using the built-in HTTP form-based fileupload mechanism, via the mg_handle_form_request API. Web applications thatuse the file upload form handler, and use parts of the user-controlledfilename in the output path, are susceptible to directory traversal

criterions.comment: civetweb package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
